A common criticism of you and your music.
That you're not a real Black artist.

You'll be walking out before I will.

Look, I don't know how to sing Black, and I don't know how to sing white either.
Music is not a color to me. It has no boundaries.

the people I have known for many years,
you know, they're people, competent people

from being the friend to the boss or from the boss to the friend.

I want you to fire her.

translation.en: This is a matter of life and death.

...some of your favorite performances of mine...

...I knew you didn't need a ladder.

You want a dog? You can have anything you want, baby.
♪ And the answers are all up to me ♪
♪ In that one moment of time ♪

translation.en: She's not doing well, Bobby, and needs to go home.

translation.en: Come on. Let's get her home.
-That's what's best. -All right. All right. Okay.
We should-- We should ask her, right?
'Cause we can. You know we can do that if we want.
Do you want to go home, baby?
[Bobby] Yeah. See? I'm taking care of her.
Is that what you're doing? Is this what you're doing? Taking care of her with this?
-Is this how you taking care of her? -You better watch that tone, Robyn.
Listen, Nip. I will not sit around and watch this...
-[Bobby] I'm tired of this, man. -[Robyn] Yeah.
I'll deal with this later. Why do I gotta deal with everyone else's shit?
translation.ko: 지금은 됐으니까 나중에 얘기해 왜 남들 일까지 다 떠맡아야 해?

translation.en: You gotta get to that venue anyway.
Yo. I'm sick of you, Robyn.
Yo, Nip. He doesn't deserve you, okay? He never has.
translation.ko: 니피, 옆에 둘 가치도 없는 인간이야

translation.en: Hey, look. Look. Look. This is through.
And your dad's in the hospital.
-[Bobby] Yeah. Uh... -Yeah. He in the hospital.
Yeah, baby. I was gonna tell you.
I was gonna tell you after the show.
Yeah. Whatever. I'm done with this shit.
[woman over PA] Lawrence, regarding a patient on line two.
I'll be out of here in a day or two. You'll see.
No. Not until the doctors say you can.
Daddy, you're gonna get the best care in the world.
I got to get out of here.
So you can just relax and get better.
What are you talking about? Pat?
You've lost your mind, little girl.
I've been taking care of everything. Your whole life.
translation.ko: 내가 네 평생 널 돌본 사람이다

translation.en: Who do you think was looking after you when your mama was going off on them tours?
translation.ko: 네 엄마 투어 다닐 때 너 누가 키웠니?

translation.en: So, you ain't taking over shit.
Yeah? What about the millions you spent?
translation.ko: 그래? 네가 써버린 수백만 달러는 어쩌고?

translation.en: Court cases, lawyers, your private jets.
My private jets, my money, Daddy.
Then you better get yourself a good lawyer.
And you better pay me all the money you owe me.

translation.en: My piece from that new record deal that I negotiated for you with Arista.

translation.en: Okay, like you're taking care of your new wife by coming after me?

translation.en: They pay by the album, and I haven't done any new albums yet.
As of right now, it's almost all gone.
And now you're breaking my heart.
I know you and Bobby are hiding it.
translation.ko: 바비랑 짜고 돈 숨긴 거 안다

translation.en: You get me my money, princess.
No. No. I'm not your princess.
I'm not your princess no more.
...the body of our brother John Houston.
How long has it been like this?
Everything's fine. Everything's gonna be fine.
but you don't have to participate so enthusiastically in the process.

translation.en: You've hurt yourself along the way.

translation.en: A private, secure residence. You'll be closely monitored.

translation.en: Yeah, shit. I mean, I wish somebody would tell the media that.
What I looked for in you wasn't there.

I still got you. Look, hey...
We can talk this out. Right?
I hope I remember how to sing.
I talked to the musical director. I told him to follow your lead.
It's your first time back. You set the pace.

Clive, it's my first of the day.

And Whitney has always been distinguished by her range of notes.

and a mezzo-soprano that earned her the nickname "The Voice."

Are you going back to rehab?

Did you see me sing on Oprah?

translation.en: I saw you in Copenhagen too.
People wanna see Whitney Houston. You set that standard.

I'm not going away. I can't lose this.
If you're ready, I'm there for you, Whit. I always am, but--
Do you think this carpet needs a vacuum?
No. No, I'm excited. I'm so excited.
I gotta go downstairs and get some more honey.
Why don't you go to your room?
I'm gonna get ready for tonight, okay?
I'm gonna make you so proud.
Yeah, that's it. You got it, baby.

♪ And it sure would be nice ♪

The things we do to get it, and the things we do to keep it.

With thanks for all the love you've given me.
